charges.charge_disposition: THE DEFENDANT:pleaded guilty to Count(s) 1, 2, 3, 5, 7, 9, 11, &; 13 of the Indictment on 07/12/2018. IMPRISONMENT: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of: 36 months on each of Counts 1, 3, 5, 7, 9, 11, and 13, to be served concurrently, and 84 months on Count 2, to be served consecutively for a total term of 120 months. The court makes the following recommendations to the Bureau of Prisons: The defendant be screened for placement at the BOP facility located in Leavenworth, KS for participation in career training programs. The defendant is remanded to the custody of the United States Marshal. SUPERVISED RELEASE: Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of: Two (2) years. MANDATORY CONDITIONS. STANDARD CONDITIONS OF SUPERVISION. SPECIAL CONDITIONS OF SUPERVISION. MSA: $800.00 imposed. No Fine. Restitution: $4,484.70.
